message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd be very interested in. I believe it's worth $150 to you, but I'm willing to offer it to you for $140 to make it a great deal.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to save as much money as I can.
I understand you're on a budget, Bob. How about we meet in the middle at $135? It's a fantastic deal for a product you'll truly value.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. I'm willing to make a deal, but I'm still trying to save as much as I can.
